name: web-speed-test-wdio
description: Web speed test using Mocha, WebDriverIO, Allure report
author: Felix Zilber

scripts._tslint-conflict-check: Check for conflict rules in tslint json
scripts.prepare: npm run cleanAll && npm run compile && npm run linter
scripts._test: Execute test suite with headless browser
scripts._test:dev: Execute test locally suite with allure report
scripts._report: Generate allure report and open it in firefox
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report &&  open -a firefox allure-report/index.html
scripts._cleanTestReport: remove all build data, logs and reports. compile, execute tests and create a report with local configuration
scripts.cleanTestReport: npm run cleanAll && npm run linter && npm run compile && wdio wdio.dev.conf.js --suite speedTestSuite && npm run report
scripts._suite: Runs a single suite with dev config. Sample usage: npm run suite speedTestSuite
scripts._spec: Runs a single spec with dev config. Sample usage: npm run spec ./lib/specs/WebSpeedTest.js
